result.execSummary:
The defendant Brandi Rose Fleming was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Appearances:  Mr. Bruce Poquette- District Attorney, Mr. Michael Kelsey- Attorney at Law,  Defendant
PLEA AND SENTENCING HEARING
(JUDGE'S SENTENCING PORTION OF THE HEARING)
HELD ON APRIL 24, 2017
Notice of right to seek postconviction relief.

Defendant Brandi Rose Fleming in court with attorney Michael Arthur Kelsey.  Defendant Brandi Rose Fleming in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases 16 CF 103, 16 CM 262, 16 CM 49,15 CM 435, 16 CF 69, 16 CF 52, 16 CM 119 and 16 TR 760  State recites agreement.  DE entered NC plea to count 1 in 16 CM 262, 16 CF 52 Count 3, 16 CF 69 and 16 CF 103.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  

16 CF 103 and 16 CF 69 - DE waived her right to a preliminary exam.  Court advised her as to her right to a prelim.  Court finds DE has freely waived her right to a prelim and binds her over for trial.  Court finds DE guilty of 16 CM 262, 16 CF 103, 16 CF 69 and count 3 in 16 CF 52.

Court:  16 CF 52:  Court 3 - 187 days county jail with credit for 187 days time served concurrent to 16 CM 262 - Fine/costs $579.00 given 30 DTP or set up payment plan - counts 1, 2, 4 and 5 are dismissed and read-in

16 CF 103:  Sentence w/held probation 3 years -  Any counseling DOC may impose - AODA - absolute sobriety - if successfully completes probation case to be expunged automatically - fine/costs $969.00 - Dismissed and read-in 16 CM 49, 15 CM 435, 16 CM 119 and 16 TR 760 - Bond posted in this case to be returned to person who posted it

16 CM 262:  187 days county jail with credit for 187 days time served - fine/costs $579.00 given 30 DTP or set up payment plan - count 2 is dismissed and read-in

16 CF 69:  Sentence w/held probation 3 years - any counseling DOC may impose -  AODA - absolute sobriety - if successfully completes probation eligible for expunction automatically - Fine/Costs $969.00 - Dismissed and read-in 16 CM 49, 15 CM 435, 16 CM 119 and 16 TR 760

Defendant Brandi Rose Fleming in court with attorney Michael Arthur Kelsey.  Defendant Brandi Rose Fleming in custody.
